agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Pensions, Investments & Financial Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, February 21, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jim Murphy The committee will meet to hear invited agency testimony. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
